Package model

Class GameTracker

java.lang.Object
model.GameTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<Hand>
public class GameTracker extends Object implements Iterator<Hand>
Class that keeps track of the current game of blackjack.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameTracker​(Player... players)
    Creates a new instance of blackjack and sets up by creating a Hand for each Player and Dealer
